name: lob-openapi
description: Tooling for OpenAPI spec for Lob API

scripts.postman: npm run bundle && openapi2postmanv2 --pretty --spec dist/$npm_package_config_bundlefile --output dist/$npm_package_config_postmanfile -O folderStrategy=Tags
scripts.redoc: redoc-cli bundle $npm_package_config_specfile -t actions/redoc/template.hbs --templateOptions.segmentKey=$SEGMENT_API_KEY --title="DRAFT NEW Lob API documentation" --options.noAutoAuth=true --options.maxDisplayedEnumValues=15 --options.theme.colors.primary.main=#27333c --options.theme.sidebar.backgroundColor=#f7f9fa --options.expandResponses='200,201' --options.jsonSampleExpandLevel=3 --options.requiredPropsFirst=true --options.theme.typography.code.backgroundColor=#ebf0f6 --options.theme.typography.code.fontFamily=JetBrainsMono --options.theme.typography.code.color=#27333c --options.theme.typography.fontFamily="Larsseit,sans-serif;" --options.theme.typography.links.color=#0099d7 --options.theme.typography.links.textDecoration=none --options.theme.codeBlock.backgroundColor=#ecf0f5 --options.theme.rightPanel.backgroundColor=#f7f9fa --options.theme.rightPanel.textColor=#416581 --options.theme.typography.fontSize=16 -o docs/index.html

author: engineering@lob.com
